channel.title: Posts on Will's Tea House
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Will's Tea House

item.title: Not an Ad
item.description: Hey y’all! Hope you’re doing good! If you don’t have some tea in front of you right now, stop reading and go brew some! Today I’m sipping on some Tai Ping Hou Kui that I just got - review coming soon, so I won’t blab about it. Just wanted to let everyone know about some tea related apps I’ve created: TeaBuddy, a tea companion app on Android Gongfu Tea Timer, a Gongfu tea timer app I threw together for a user on r/tea

item.title: Grand Opening
item.description: Welcome! If you’re looking for my old website, unfortunately thats gone for good now, and in its place is what I hope to be a space where I can post my thoughts on anything related to tea. About me: name: William Shi favourite tea: dragon pearls or genmaicha Here’s my tea collection: Here’s my favourite mug: Here’s a photo of me!: Thanks for reading!
